import facade from'./loginFacade';import{baseURL}from"./settings";import EditDog from'./components/EditDog';function handleHttpErrors(res){if(!res.ok){return Promise.reject({status:res.status,fullError:res.json()});}return res.json();}function demoFacade(){var fetchData=function fetchData(url,method,body){var options=facade.makeOptions(method,true,body);//True add's the token
return fetch(baseURL+url,options).then(handleHttpErrors);};var addDog=function addDog(newDog){return fetchData("api/dog/add","POST",newDog);};var getAllDogsByUser=function getAllDogsByUser(){return fetchData("api/dog/all","GET");};var getAllBreeds=function getAllBreeds(){return fetchData("api/dog/breeds","GET");};var getBreedInformation=function getBreedInformation(breed){return fetchData("api/dog/breeds/"+breed,"GET");};var deleteDog=function deleteDog(id){return fetchData("api/dog/"+id,"DELETE");};var editDog=function editDog(id,updatedDog){return fetchData("api/dog/"+id,"PUT",updatedDog);};return{addDog:addDog,getAllDogsByUser:getAllDogsByUser,getAllBreeds:getAllBreeds,getBreedInformation:getBreedInformation,deleteDog:deleteDog,editDog:editDog};}var demo=demoFacade();export default demo;
